name: Grocery Heaven
tecnology: React, Metarial-Ui, MongoDB, Node JS, Express JS, Mongoose, Redux, Axios, JWT, Nodemailer, Formik, Yup
about: Grocery Heaven is a Grocery Shop.
about2: ●  Crafted a user authentication flow that seamlessly blends robust security with a user-friendly experience, ensuring confidential and effortless logins and logouts.
about3: ●  Curated an intelligent product ecosystem featuring category-driven navigation, empowering users to effortlessly explore and discover products tailored to their preferences.
about4: ●  Ignited shopping excitement with dynamic 'Trending' and 'Best Sellers' sections; our spellbinding 'Related Products' feature invites users into a captivating world of tailored discoveries.
about5: ●  Conducted a shopping symphony with one-click 'Add to Cart' and 'Add to Wishlist' turning checkout into a blissful journey from desire to satisfaction.
about6: ●  Architected an admin interface for operational wizards, providing administrators with an efficient toolkit for managing product inventory, tracking orders, and overseeing user interactions.

name: Roktokonika
tecnology: React , React Router , Node.js, Firebase, Express.js, Mongodb, Metarial-Ui, React Hook Form
about: Roktokonika is a volunteer type website.
about2: ●  Roktokonika is a volunteer type website.
about3: ●  Home page will have a header (simple navbar), banner, volunteers, team, and footer.
about4: ●  If user logs in, then he can go to dashboard component and see write post, register support, register clean, register donor route.
about5: ●  If you register from register donor route, data will be added to blood donor nested route. If you register from register clean route, data will be added to clean team nested route. If you register from register support route, data will be added to support team nested route.
about6: ●  You must be logged in to go to the Volunteers component.
about7: ●  If admin logs in then he can go to dashboard component write post, register support, register clean, register donor, make admin, manage all post, add team member, manage team, manage blood donor, manage clean team, manage supporters.

name: Code Knowledge

about4: ● Fees and teachers are different for each course. Each course must be purchased.

about6: ●  The question and answer part , we describe about some basic programming language.
about7: ●  Code Knowledge is a nationwide online platform for learning programming. We believe that programming will bring a new look to the world. This online education system has been introduced so that we do not fall behind in programming.

name: Roktokonika Volunteer
about: The project is create to find volunteers for good social work.
about2: ●  The project is create to find volunteers for good social work.
about3: ●  Our budget for social development is $100,000.
about4: ●  Those who will volunteer will have to give their name, surname, address, age, email and donation. There will be a button below the details of each volunteer. Button event handler is used.
about5: ●  Clicking on the button will add his donation to the cart on the right and the number of times he clicks on the button will be the same amount of donation. How many people have donated will also be written. And all donations will be total. And the names of those who have donated will remain.
